content: time and money argues persuasively that the troubles which characterise modern capitalintensive economies particularly the episodes of boom and bust may best be analysed with the aid of a capitalbased macroeconomics the primary focus of this text is the intertemporal structure of capital an area that until now has been neglected in favour of labour and moneybased macroeconomics
title: time and money the macroeconomics of capital structure routledge foundations of the market economy
